Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a winning single in the ninth inning, scoring Trea Turner and securing a 7-6 victory for the Phillies.
Bryce Harper hit a two-run homer and scored twice.
Mark Vientos hit a pair of two-run homers for the Mets.
Pete Alonso and Brandon Nimmo each hit solo home runs for the Mets.
Bryson Stott hit a go-ahead, two-run triple in the eighth inning on his 27th birthday.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos expressed amazement at his game-winning hit and reflected on the memorable moment with his son.
Bryce Harper praised the team's 'never-die mentality' and the support of the Phillies fans.
Mets manager Carlos Mendoza looked forward to returning to Citi Field for Game 3.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the second postseason matchup between the NL East rivals.
Attendance at Citizens Bank Park was 45,679.
